Welcome to my portfolio. This is a site where you can see all my R projects that I worked on for STA9750 Software Tools for Data Analysis at Baruch College Zicklin School of Business.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

if(!require("leaflet")){
    options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cloud.r-project.org"))
    install.packages("leaflet")
    stopifnot(require("leaflet"))
}

baruch_longitude <- -75.9695
baruch_latitude  <- +42.0894

leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, zoom=17) |>
  addPopups(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, 
            "I completed my Bachelor's degree at <b>Binghamton University</b>! The campus was supposed to be shaped like a brain.")
```
